body_html:
@Rongnian
I don't know if this is still an issue for you but I experienced the same error today. I found a solution that worked for me: only set the device for nodes where the device string is non-empty.

for(int i = 0; i < graph_def.node_size(); ++i)
{
      if (graph_def.mutable_node(i)->device().empty() == false)
            graph_def.mutable_node(i)->set_device(device);
}

And the device string that I set it to is /device:GPU:x (you can simply check the format that is used by printing the current value).
